data.title: Hangin' Around With You From Strike Up The Band, 1930 (Vocal) Lyrics
meta_keywords: Listen to Hangin' Around With You From Strike Up The Band
Hangin' Around With You From Strike Up The Band
1930 (Vocal) Song MP3 by Kristin Chenoweth and Jason Alexander
Download Hangin' Around With You From Strike Up The Band
data.meta_description: Hangin' Around With You From Strike Up The Band, 1930 (Vocal) Lyrics by Kristin Chenoweth. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
JASON ALEXANDER: Kristin, are you okay cause you've been a little stand-off-ish for this whole session KRISTIN CHENOWETH: Yea, Jason, I'm fine... JASON: Okay KRISTIN: ...I just keep hearing things about you and those other women. JASON: Oh, you mean the other albums that I'm gonna do? KRISTIN: Yea. JASON: Well those are just friends of mine. KRISTIN: Yeah, well that's not what I heard. Ya know, I thought I was special. JASON: Well you are, but I mean it's Beth and Barbra... KRISTIN: ...and Whoopi? Jason, she's not exactly known for her singing. JASON: Yeah, it's kind of a rap thing. KRISTIN: Jason, you've got to learn to take this relationship seriously! JASON: Huh. KRISTIN: Once, you would hang around me Hang, 'round me night and day I thought that love had found me When we became that way (JASON: Well, sure.) Now, it's a different story You're not a one-girl man I've heard you're in your glory Playing the Dapper Dan (JASON: Well I am a natural at that...) You may tell me you're a Saint But listen to my complaint What's the use of hangin' around with you? (JASON: What?) Hangin' around with you Hangin' around with you, deary? I never know I never know just where I stand What's the use of bangin' around with you? (JASON: Huh?) Bangin' around with you Bangin' around with you, deary? You've gotta give This little girl a bigger hand (JASON: I have given you e-) You're not acting the beau That I once used to know (JASON: Well I feel a little pressure here!) I'm beginning to see That I'm likely to be On the shelf If you want me hangin' around with you (JASON: Hey!) Hangin' around with you Hangin' around with you, deary You've gotta learn You've gotta learn to be yourself (JASON: Oh hoho, no, no, no, no, no...) JASON: I simply must deny it I swear it isn't true My heart is on a diet Darling, except for you (KRISTIN: That's not what I heard!) When I'm with other damsels Really, I don't go far (KRISTIN: Yea?) I try to tell those ma'm'selles Just what a peach you are (KRISTIN: They think I'm a peach?) Oh I'm so misunderstood Though I've tried to be so good Ah, what's the use of hangin' around with you? (KRISTIN: Huh?) Hangin' around with you Hangin' around with you, deary? I never know I never know just where I'm at And what's the use of bangin' around with you? (KRISTIN: Well!) Bangin' around with you Bangin' around with you, deary? Oh I'm afraid You're forcing me to leave you flat (KRISTIN: flat) Oh boy... KRISTIN: Please don't be in a huff (JASON: Hey!) It was only a bluff (JASON: Don't you think this is getting kinda complicated?) Everything is in vain If you mean to remain so upstage If you want me hangin' around with you BOTH: Hangin' around with you Hangin' around with you, deary KRISTIN: You've gotta learn You've gotta learn to act- Your agent called Your other gigs fell through JASON: I love this album BOTH: You've gotta learn You've gotta learn to act your age Writer(s): George Gershwin, Ira Gershwin
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
